case.title: I want to meet and get to know a bbw or a mature older woman. - 20
case.text: Plain and simple, i want to meet a nice bbw or an older woman. Maybe hang out, go on a date or something like that. Lets get to know each other and see where that goes. BBW's because i like chubby women because theres more to love ;), but i wouldn't mind a slim woman either, and an older mature woman because ive always wanted to be with and date and older woman. By the way im a 20 year old hispanic male. If interested please reply asap with a pic and I'll reply asap. Have a great day ladies.
